channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei -- M5 lite 10
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei -- M5 lite 10

item.title: CVE-2019-19398|2024-08-05T02:16:47.211Z -- huawei -- m5%20lite%2010
item.description: M5 lite 10 with versions of 8.0.0.182(C00) have an insufficient input validation vulnerability. Due to the input validation logic is incorrect, an attacker can exploit this vulnerability to modify the memory of the device by doing a series of operations. Successful exploit may lead to malicious code execution.
